description: HipPOPs ‘“edible art” are all natural, gluten-free, ORB Certified kosher frozen POPs on a stick, crafted in the old-world tradition of Italian gelaterias. Offering handcrafted artisan dessert treats including gelato, sorbet and frozen yogurt, HipPOPs uses only a handful of high-quality ingredients, sourcing local dairy and the freshest fruit from local farms, whenever possible. POPs are handcrafted in small batches at the company’s micro-creamery in Dania Beach, FL, and delivered to the streets of South Florida from the mobile HipPOPs Dessert Truck. With an array of premium chocolate dips and “POPpings,” there are hundreds of customizable HipPOPs variations to please any palette including fresh coconut, hazelnuts, pistachios & pecans. HipPOPs provides seamless catering and table service and participates at festivals and fundraising opportunities.
name: HipPOPs
